required.title: Authentication Required
required.message: You need to be logged in to access this content.

error.sessionExpired: Your session has expired. Please sign in again.
error.emailConflict: Email address conflict detected: Your email is already linked to another login method.
error.emailConflictSuggestion: We recommend using GitHub login, or the login method you've successfully used before.
error.emailConflictTechnical: Technical reason: Multiple accounts with the same email address exist in the system.
error.unverifiedDiscord: Unverified Discord email: You need to verify your Discord account's email address first.
error.unverifiedDiscordSuggestion: Please log into your Discord account and complete email verification before trying again.
error.unverifiedDiscordAlternative: Alternatively, you can try using another login method such as GitHub or Google.
error.verifyingIdentity: Please wait while we verify your identity...
error.recommendedGithub: We recommend using GitHub login, which may resolve the issue you encountered previously.
error.recommendedGoogle: We recommend using Google login, which may resolve the issue you encountered previously.
error.recommendedDiscord: We recommend using Discord login, which may resolve the issue you encountered previously.
error.recommendedSolana: We recommend using Solana wallet login, which may resolve the issue you encountered previously.

callback.accountSuccessful: Your account may have been successfully logged in, we are verifying the login status...
callback.validSessionDetected: Valid session detected in error page, automatically redirecting to home page

detectionPage.title: Smart Contract Security Audit
detectionPage.subtitle: Advanced security analysis for blockchain projects and smart contracts

code.title: Paste Code for Security Analysis
code.placeholder: Paste your Solidity, Rust, Go, or other supported code here...

github.title: GitHub Repository Security Audit
github.singleRepoDescription: Enter a single repository URL for immediate analysis
github.feature1: Scans all smart contracts in the repository
github.feature3: Detects vulnerabilities across the entire codebase
github.feature4: Provides comprehensive security report with recommendations

upload.title: Upload Your Project Code
upload.description: This feature is coming soon. You will be able to upload zipped project files for comprehensive analysis.
upload.placeholder: Drag and drop files here or click to browse
upload.comingSoon: This feature is coming soon. We're working on supporting direct file uploads for more comprehensive analysis.

error.emptyCode: Please enter the code to analyze.
error.invalidGithubUrl: Please enter a valid GitHub repository URL (e.g., https://github.com/owner/repo).
error.apiError: An error occurred during analysis. Please try again later.

feature1.title: Vulnerability Detection
feature1.description: Identifies common smart contract vulnerabilities including reentrancy, integer overflow/underflow, and unchecked external calls.

feature2.title: Gas Optimization
feature2.description: Analyzes contract efficiency and suggests improvements to reduce gas costs and optimize performance.

feature3.title: Detailed Reporting
feature3.description: Provides comprehensive security reports with severity ratings, vulnerability descriptions, and actionable recommendations.

ai.title: AI-Powered Analysis
ai.subtitle: Preliminary audit powered by DeepSeek AI
ai.disclaimer: This is a preliminary AI-powered audit. For critical projects, we recommend a full professional audit.

reportPage.title: Security Reports
reportPage.dailySubtitle: Daily security audit reports with detailed vulnerability analysis
reportPage.weeklySubtitle: Weekly consolidated security report with trend analysis
reportPage.betaNotice: Note: If you have any questions about the security scan results, please contact our team.

report.title: Smart Contract Security Audit Report
report.aiDisclaimer: This is a preliminary AI-powered audit. For critical projects, we recommend a full professional audit.
report.disclaimer: This report is provided for informational purposes only and does not constitute professional advice. Chain Fox is not liable for any damages arising from the use of this report.
